attributes.review: being an american citizen, i wanted to show all my love😍 and support for the “greatest” president of all time. so i chose to download this app in order to dive into the deep depths of the extraordinary talent of my president . i thought i had just made the best decision possible and even had extremely high expectations for this app, but boy oh boy, those expectations quickly dropped below the bar that they dropped all the way to hell 🥵🤬. firstly this app took WEEKS ✨🧚🏻 to download onto my phone. thus causing my phone to slow down completely that i couldn’t even keep up with the WISE words of my president. second of all, once i was FINALLY able to go onto the app, it asked for my phone number and social security number. 😏😩😱😮 like is this america’s way of stealing my information 🤔. is this the start of the american virus? 🦠mike pompeo should be looking to ban this app ASAP. like i know i’m great, talented, intelligent, magnificent, and so much more, which is why i understand why my president would need my information. and i can actually take my sat’s on my own. lastly, it asked me what type of person i was. and i stated that i was a latina. and as soon as i put that in 🤤 red lights started flashing from my phone and a siren began to go off (but go off i guess 🤭😳). my phone went haywire and bonkers. but that’s not even the worst part. after going off so viciously, it told me “go back to your country. ” i was shocked 😮 😯😳 honey🍯 i was in tears 😭. so i was presented with only one option. 😢 i had to throw my phone away. which has made it impossible to keep up with the shane yaw. and i am in utter disbelief that a president who claims to love 💕 latinx people would say something as ignorant and as stupid as that. and he has now lost my vote for the upcoming election🥺🥶🥵😡 (never even liked him to begin with). i guess the number 45 really does define his ranking amongst the other terrible presidents (sorry not sorry 😐 🤯🤬😫). anyways, if i had the option of giving this app a 0/10 i most definitely would. but 0/10 would not recommend 🤮🤢🤕😿😹😻. and now i am forever scarred 😾💀👽 and left with emotional trauma. but hey look on the bright side, at least i don’t have a bad tan and dementia 🤭🥱🤐. vote blue!!! 🥶
attributes.title: 👁👅👁🤚. no❤️
